Current Version 1.3.1

Change log:

1.3.1

  • Changed 2nd level tab Individual Retirement Accounts to Individual Retirement Accounts (IRAs)
  • Removed Small Business Resource Center in Small Business Plans tab

1.3.0

  • Updated default height for each group of menu items from 366 to 230
  • Disabled rightrail for menus that have a lot of items
  • Reorganized tall menus into three columns
  • Removed hover on indices
  • Styled percent change and change to float right of indices
  • Give 15px left margin to all indices
  • Changed DOW and S&P indices to positive to reflect green proof-of-concept
  • Moved Research > Products to the right column
  • Moved Retirement Small Business Plans to center column
  • Conditionally add an additional 10px or 30px to the tabHeight for additional padding at the bottom depending if there is 5 or more menu items in .menus

1.2.5

  • Changed Fixed Income Solutions label to Bonds & Fixed Income Solutions

1.2.4

  • Added "All Account Records"

1.2.3

  • Changed IPOs to IPOs & Other New Issues

1.2.2

  • Changed Security Settings to Security & Passwords

1.2.1

  • In Research tab, updated Educational Overview to Education
  • Added Commentary & Insights as last item in Education
  • In Trade tab, Trade Status menu, moved Portfolio to the last position

1.2.0

  • Implemented correct single column widths in middle section of navigation
  • Implemented new left nav style
    • #eee background color instead of #000 background color
    • #2d2d2d for font color
    • #99cc00 border left on selected h3 left nav item
    • border-bottom color changed to #d8d8d8
    • added the triangle caret using the h3 before pseudo element
  • Removed additional top border in the tray when megamenu is open
  • Added a top border to the tray when megamenu is closed
  • Removed inset box shadow from all panels in megamenu
  • Removed down carets from first level of megamenu
  • Lined up first h4 in middle column of nav to the first tab text
  • Added a container to separate "All [option]" links from their respective sections
    • Added container keys with a boolean value to the JS object for menu items
    • If set to true, it will wrap in a div with class bottom-container
  • Make right panel background white
  • Changed Tax Center title header to Tax Records in Tax & Account Records section
  • Added Tax Center as the first link in Tax & Account Records section
  • Added a space between Individual Retirement Account and (IRAs)
  • Fixed typos in Trade menu
    • Place A Trade -> Place a Trade
    • Place A Conditional Trade -> Place a Conditional Trade
  • Implemented indices change on hover to percent change with % symbol
  • Updated red alerts notification number to be on the left instead of the right
  • Fixed height of tray and adjusted some padding in the anchor tags inside tray
  • Updated touch animation to be more in line with desktop
  • Tapping twice on the same first level menu item now closes the megamenu
  • Remove bold from indices
  • Use color from data-color in indices
    • Changed purple color to #cc0099
  • Changed hover intent setTimeout delay to 60ms from 85ms
  • Halved the slide/animate time from default 400ms to 150ms
  • Changed top border color of tray to #242427 from #575759

1.1.6

  • Added css rule "outline: 0 none;" to #bella-nav a to fix outline problem in IE

1.1.5

  • Removed bottom arrow pointing up on the main tabs
  • Applied the green arrow pointing down to the selected class

1.1.4

  • Updated codebase with UAT version of bella-nav
  • Increased the amount of time of "hoverIntent" from 50 to 85 for better effect
  • Implemented $tempCurrent on line 2236, 2250, and 2278 for removal of ".current" on hover of the other nav items

1.1.3

  • Added URLs to megamenu object for top level menu items (Accounts, Research, Retirement)
  • Replaced the current URLs of javascript:void 0 to the URLs defined in the megamenu object
  • Commented out console.log('closed'); in closeFlyouts() function definition
  • Changed navigation interaction from click to hover
  • Added hoverIntent to the sub menu inside the mega drop down
  • Because hoverIntent hijacks events, initial showing of first submenu items had to be manually initialized/shown instead of relying on .trigger('mouseover')

1.1.2

  • Global Nav utility links null state color from #c0c0c0 to #D8D8D8
  • Symbol & Search field null state background colors from #4d4d4d to #5B5B5B
  • Symbol & Search field text null state colors from #8c8a8a to #CCCCCC
  • Indices market name text null state color from #c0c0c0 to #898989
  • Indices market value text null state color from #7c7c7c to #CCCCCC
  • Move Money & Alerts text null state color from #c0c0c0 to #D8D8D8
